CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Note that , in stark contrast to PCDTBT : PC71BM system in which thermal annealing reduced the photovoltaic parameters ( FF , J SC , and V OC ) , 22 the performance of all PCDSeBT - based devices for this study is considerably improved as a result of thermal treatment.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the given paragraph:

2. PC71BM
3. PCDSeBT

2. PC71BM
3. PCDSeBT

| PCDSeBT |

Paragraph: Note that , in stark contrast to PCDTBT : PC71BM system in which thermal annealing reduced the photovoltaic parameters ( FF , J SC , and V OC ) , 22 the performance of all PCDSeBT - based devices for this study is considerably improved as a result of thermal treatment.

Sure! Here are the "Property Name" entities in the paragraph:

2. J SC (Short-Circuit Current Density)
3. V OC (Open-Circuit Voltage)

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Note that , in stark contrast to PCDTBT : PC71BM system in which thermal annealing reduced the photovoltaic parameters ( FF , J SC , and V OC ) , 22 the performance of all PCDSeBT - based devices for this study is considerably improved as a result of thermal treatment.

Let's think step by step.

The "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are:

1. FF (Filling Factor)
2. JSC (Short-Circuit Current)
3. VOC (Open-Circuit Voltage)

These are the three photovoltaic parameters that are mentioned in the paragraph as being affected by thermal annealing in the PCDSeBT-based devices.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that clearly refer to the value of a material property:

1. VOC (Open-Circuit Voltage)
2. JSC (Short-Circuit Current)

These two entities are the ones that directly refer to the value of material properties, specifically the voltage and current properties of the PCDSeBT-based devices.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's a Markdown table with the valid entities presented in the same words as in the original paragraph:

| Property Value |
| --- |
| VOC (Open-Circuit Voltage) |
| JSC (Short-Circuit Current) |
